SELECT b.account, a.name, a.ip, a.uri, a.method, a.params, a.ua, a.status, a.cost_time, a.result,
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sys_log a LEFT JOIN sys_account b ON b.id = a.user_id
AND a.company_id = 0
AND a.company_id != 0
AND b.account = #{account}
AND a.name = #{name}
AND a.uri = #{uri}
AND a.status = #{status}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
